column6:
"MERCURY RISING",2007,3
The conclusion! X-23 and Hellion have stormed the Facility to rescue Mercury. And as if Kimura and a
hundred Facility agents wasn't bad enough, something is roaming the halls of the Facility... something designed to feed on mutants. Predator X is on the loose, and nothing will ever be the same for the New X-Men! Part 4 (of 4)!
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | penciller (cover):Paco Medina | colorist:Brian Reber | letterer:Dave Sharpe | inker:Juan Vlasco
